subject: Accidents and Safety
Marathon Running
Running
Traffic Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Sally Meyerhoff, a top American marathoner who was training for the 2012 Olympic trials, was killed when she was struck by a pickup truck while riding her bicycle.
snippet: Sally Meyerhoff, a top American marathoner who was training for the 2012 Olympic trials, was killed when she was struck by a pickup truck while riding her bicycle.
